channel.title: Need lots of help
channel.description: Okay, I am pretty new to the whole idea of programming an private sever, and I have some questions. First off, what is the best client and source for me to start off with? I have searched in the download section but I cannot seem to find one with a good client and source. Next, I have already done portforwarding, created a no-ip, do I just change the Ip in client.java and GUI.java to my no-ip address? I have done that before but people still cannot connect to my server. Thanks in advance.

item.title: Need lots of help
item.dc:creator: @_Jake1 ~Jake
item.description:
@_Jake1 wrote:

[quote=“predatorish, post:1, topic:285925”]Okay, I am pretty new to the whole idea of programming an private sever, and I have some questions. First off, what is the best client and source for me to start off with? I have searched in the download section but I cannot seem to find one with a good client and source. Next, I have already done portforwarding, created a no-ip, do I just change the Ip in client.java and GUI.java to my no-ip address? I have done that before but people still cannot connect to my server.
Thanks in advance.[/quote]

I almost just shit my pants… Not gonna lie this is the first time I have seen someone asking for help in the help section use proper grammer and english… You just made my entire day, so for that I thank you. Anyway people already answered your nooby question but I would recommend the source of KevenScape. Search for it in the download section. Hope I helped =)

~Jake

Read full topic

item.title: Need lots of help
item.dc:creator: @undertaxxx undertaxxx
item.description:
@undertaxxx wrote:

depends, 317 or 508? (or others)

Client: Doesnt really matter cause everyone uses other clients…

Server source:

Get a clean source, which doesn’t have too many bugs, and has all the basics you need/want.
You can see in the download section for server sources etc, what the best one would be.

I can’t reccomend you one cause i don’t know what kind of server you’re wanting to make…

Anyway, hope this helped you out a little lol…

Read full topic

item.title: Need lots of help
item.dc:creator: @toomuchmopar toomuchmopar
item.description:
@toomuchmopar wrote:

lul, Client is a ‘file pack’ which allows you to connect to a server and play there. Source, however, is an base of the client, which you can modify, edit, code, (do WHATEVER) and you can create your own server once modified the source. Remember! give the credits who deservers them(if you just take the source, modify 1 item and release it as your own ppl start blaming you about leeching)

Read full topic

item.description:

Okay, thank you. I have one more question that is pretty noobish, what is the diffrence between a client and a source>

item.title: Need lots of help
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

[quote=“predatorish, post:1, topic:285925”]Okay, I am pretty new to the whole idea of programming an private sever, and I have some questions. First off, what is the best client and source for me to start off with? I have searched in the download section but I cannot seem to find one with a good client and source. Next, I have already done portforwarding, created a no-ip, do I just change the Ip in client.java and GUI.java to my no-ip address? I have done that before but people still cannot connect to my server.
Thanks in advance.[/quote]

Most people go for the flashy sources. But get a nice, organized, and clean source. That way, it will be easy go code, and easy to edit. Personally, I would recommend Sk1ttlezrule43v. His final edition comes with a 317, 508, and 525 source. Depends on which deob your going after. Alot of people like All-Star scape source. And others like other sources. Clients are another thing. It really doesn’t matter which client you go after. But different deob source types cause for different clients. Here is the source.

  • http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,348090.0.html (317)
  • http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342786.0.html (317 v2)
  • http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,351917.0.html (317, 508, 525 v3)

It really doesn’t matter, just choose what you like best. ^.-

Read full topic
